org.flexiblepower.efi.util

Class RunningMode<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.flexiblepower.efi.util.RunningMode<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The value stored in this RunningMode (depends on where the RunningMode is being used)

    public class RunningMode<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to describe different modes in which a device can run. This is used in both the buffer and the unconstrained abstractions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Construct a new, immutable RunningMode object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RunningMode

        public RunningMode(int id,
           java.lang.String name,
           T value,
           java.util.Set<Transition> possibleTransitions)
        Construct a new, immutable RunningMode object.
        Parameters:
        id - Device-unique identifier for this RunningMode
        name - Human readable name for this RunningMode
        value - Value stored in this RunningMode
        possibleTransitions - Possible transitions from this RunningMode to another. This Set should not be empty, unless this is the only RunningMode for this Actuator.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - Thrown when name, value or possibleTransitions is null

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Returns:
        A unique identifier (within the context of this device) for this running mode.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        A human readable name for this running mode. E.g. “full power”.

      • getValue

        public T getValue()
        Returns:
        The value associated with this RunningMode

      • getTransitions

        public java.util.Collection<Transition> getTransitions()
        Returns:
        A list of zero or more Transition objects that contain constraints for switching from this RunningMode to another. There may be no transition to this RunningMode (itself).

      • getTransitionTo

        public Transition getTransitionTo(RunningMode<T> runningMode)
        Parameters:
        runningMode - The running mode to switch to
        Returns:
        The Transition that can be used to move to that RunningMode, or null if that transition is not possible

      • getTransitionTo

        public Transition getTransitionTo(int runningModeId)
        Parameters:
        runningModeId - The identifier of the running mode to switch to
        Returns:
        The Transition that can be used to move to the corresponding RunningMode, or null if that transition is not possible
